name: WP Reviews
author: AH Website

sections.description:
Best Review Plugin. Customer reviews powered with shortcode to display both grid reviews and slider reviews.

Features

Display all client reviews with count functionality
* [review_grid]
* [review_grid count=”9″]

Display client reviews filtered by Category with count functionality
* [review_grid_cat category=”test”]
* [review_grid_cat category=”test” count=”9″]

Display client slider reviews with count functionality
* [review_slider]
* [review_slider count=”10″]

Add Review metaboxes;
* source (facebook, google and tripadvisor)
* company name
* position
* address
* blurb
sections.installation:
1. In your admin panel, go to Plugins -> click the ‘Add New’ button.
  2. Click ‘Upload Plugin’, choose file and install.
  3. Click on the ‘Activate’ button to use wp reviews right away.
sections.changelog:
1.1.4 – 11-03-2022

  • Compatibility tested to WP 5.9

1.1.3 – 3-03-2021

  • Compatibility tested to WP 5.7

1.1.2 – 4-30-2020

  • New: Added Settings (how to use the plugin and contact info)

1.1.1 – 4-29-2020

  • New: New Test Version

1.1 – 4-29-2020

  • New: Test Version

1.0 – 4-14-2020

  • New: First dry-run of WP Reviews Lite

Initial release
